body_html:
ipython path does not seem to include pytorch...

(pytorch) pedro@hal9000:~/workspace$ python
Python 3.6.0 |Continuum Analytics, Inc.| (default, Dec 23 2016, 12:22:00)
[GCC 4.4.7 20120313 (Red Hat 4.4.7-1)] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import sys
>>> print(sys.path)
['', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python36.zip', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torchvision-0.1.7-py3.6.egg', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/six-1.10.0-py3.6.egg', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Pillow-4.0.0-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/olefile-0.44-py3.6.egg', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools-27.2.0-py3.6.egg']
>>>
(pytorch) pedro@hal9000:~/workspace$ ipython3
Python 3.6.0 |Anaconda 4.3.0 (64-bit)| (default, Dec 23 2016, 12:22:00)
Type "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

IPython 5.1.0 -- An enhanced Interactive Python.

%quickref -> Quick reference.

In [2]: print(sys.path)
['', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/bin', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/lib/python36.zip', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/lib/python3.6', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Sphinx-1.5.1-py3.6.egg', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools-27.2.0-py3.6.egg', '/home/pedro/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/IPython/extensions', '/home/pedro/.ipython']

In [3]: import torch
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ModuleNotFoundError                       Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-3-c031d3dd82fc> in <module>()
----> 1 import torch

ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'torch'
